Summary: I saw a transparent-like sphere cross above from northeast to southwest direction moving fast.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was playing ball with my dog in a parking lot because it was clear of snow after the snowstorm. The sky was sunny and clear for a change so I was looking around and saw a cloud or smoke from wood-burning stove and wondered which it was. Something caught my eye above and northeast of me -- the only thing in the sky and it was now above me! It was like a gold bubble! If you closed one eye it would be approximately the size of a bb from a rifle. But it was transparent-like, and silent. It just eased across the sky very fast. Very strange to see something move like that through the sky without a sound. What is the proopulsion system? I was just whispering to myself excitedly "What is that?" It was like Glenda the Good Witch's first appearance in The Wizard of Oz; just that fantastic. Just to interject, I knew pretty much immediately it was a real UFO because I have seen them before. It slipped over my town and the hill they call "Trimble's Knob". I remember thinking -- This thing has an agenda moving so fast. I was a bit sad then because it was headed into the sunlight and over the mountain, no chance to holler at anyone to join me and share the experience.
